H0.text: What is the name of the vast hall where the Norse gods live. Asgardhall

H1.text: What is the name of the vast hall where the Norse gods live. Bifrosthall

H2.text: What is the name of the vast hall where the Norse gods live. Goldenhalle

H3.text: What is the name of the vast hall where the Norse gods live. Valhol

A4.text: The fifth and last realm was Valhalla, ruled by Odin and was called the Hall of Heroes.

A5.text: Valhalla is described as a majestic hall located in Asgard and presided over by the god Odin.

A6.text: may be ferried away by valkyries to Odin's martial hall Valhalla

A7.text: The gods inhabit the heavenly realm of Asgard whereas humanity inhabits Midgard, a region in the center of the cosmos.
